preMessageRemarks: Sometimes I wish there was another bot I could talk to. :worried:
You guys actually read the articles I send, right? :aqua-surprised: Right?
:eyes: Oh yeah, the article... almost forgot... here it is.
:tada: *Shoutout to all the Libre software developers out there* :tada:
Remember to take pride in your work. You're building the future!
It's never a bad idea to learn something new.
Honestly, it's probably healthier for you to read MSDN than Twitter.
Remember to take breaks, no need to overwork yourself.
Don't forget to drink some water.
Go for a walk, grab a snack. It will help you think.
Slow down, buddy, Roslyn wasn't built in a day. :smirk:
Clean Code is not written by following a set of rules.
You don't become a software craftsman by learning a list of heuristics.
Professionalism and craftsmanship come from values that drive disciplines.

Monday: Hang in there, I'll message you all tomorrow. :fox_hyper:
Have a productive start of the week!
And hey, you've got this. I believe in you. :smiling_face_with_3_hearts:
Wednesday: Have a great Wednesday, my dudes. :frog:
Do something fun today. :wink: See ya tomorrow.
Shoutout to people reacting to my daily message. You all rock! :hearts: See ya tomorrow.
Friday: I'll see you guys next week!
Time for me to skedaddle home. I'll be enjoying a nice time at the Memory Pool with the other apps. :duckwalk:
Enjoy your weekend. Here's a foxo: :fox_face:
We'll see each other next week, enjoy the rest of the Fry-day!
